Brightcove Player SDK for tvOS: Previous SDK information

This topic shows the previous SDK and plugin versions for the Native Player SDK for tvOS.
The following links for the previous version of the Brightcove Native Player SDK for tvOS is for reference only. It is recommended to use the latest version of the SDK along with the plugin integrations.

Previous releases

The Brightcove Player SDK for tvOS is contained within the Player SDK for iOS. The following links are for the previous version of the Brightcove Native Player SDK for iOS.

The Brightcove Player SDK for tvOS is contained within the Player SDK for iOS. The following links are for the previous version of the Brightcove Native Player SDK for iOS.

SDK v6.7.3

12 Mar 2020

The following table contains the Brightcove plugins and partner plugin versions associated with the previous version of the Brightcove Native SDK:

Category Plugin
(Github Repo)		 Supported Partner/ Vendor Plugin
Advertising IMA plugin 6.7.3 Google IMA v4.2.0
FreeWheel plugin 6.7.3 FreeWheel Ad Manager 6.26.0
Once UX plugin 6.4.3
(Deprecated) 		None
SSAI plugin 6.7.3 None

SDK v5.3.4

24 Aug 2017

For more information, see the following:

  • SDK v5.3.4 release notes
  • SDK v5.x change log
  • Podspecs for SDK v5.3.4 and earlier
Note that there are no changes from v5.3.3 to v5.3.4, except that the README has been updated to point to the latest v6.x version of the SDK.

The following table contains the Brightcove plugins and partner plugin versions associated with the previous version of the Brightcove Native SDK:

Category Plugin
(Github Repo)		 Supported Partner/Vendor Plugin
Advertising Once UX plugin v2.1.10 None
Captions Sidecar Subtitles plugin v2.1.6 [1] [2] None
DRM FairPlay plugin v1.1.3 [3] None
